headline: Should You Reconsider McDonald's Stock After Combo Meal Price Cuts in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering what to do with your McDonald’s shares right now, you are definitely not alone. Ever since the company’s recent decision to lower combo meal prices and its bold moves into AI investments, investors have been watching closely for signals about the direction of the stock. Over the past year, McDonald’s has not only held its own but delivered an 11.4% return, with longer-term gains of 31.6% over 3 years and an impressive 63.9% over 5 years. That kind of performance naturally...

headline: DoorDash (DASH) Expands McDonald’s Partnership to Boost Growth and Access
summary: DoorDash, Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH) is one of the best stocks to invest in for long-term growth. DoorDash, Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH) and McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) have launched a new online direct ordering channel in the US, which allows customers to order McDelivery directly from McDonalds.com via mobile or desktop, without a login, an app, or an account. This […]
